form_collection.upload_logo_info:
150px x 150px 
 Supported files: PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG
form_collection.name: Collection Name
form_collection.description_placeholder: Make it brief but enough to cover the story

1.title: Choose best name, it's permanent
1.description: Collection name is permanent after its published. Also you can’t delete the collection. But you still can edit other information. <DescLink>Artist guide</DescLink>

2.title: Set your file correctly
2.description: We set your name as default title. You still can edit it before publish. After that, title and file of cards is permanent.

3.title: Prepare assigned attributes
3.description: Attributes is a characteristic that cards have. It will be calculated to generate rarity score and ranking. Attributes will be permanent to card.

4.title: Be meticulous with your card details
4.description: Once your card is listed 'for sale', people can directly buy and own it. So be sure with your card detail before you publish it

form_attribute.label: Label
form_attribute.informative_create_attribute: Attributes you save will be available to use for next cards in same collection. Assigned attribute can’t be edited or deleted after the card is published

form_card_details.title: Title
form_card_details.error_copies_card4card: Your edition must be at least 100 copies.
form_card_details.description_placeholder: Keep it short and interesting but long enough to cover the story...
form_card_details.error_max_royalty: Total royalty can not be more than 90%
form_card_details.category_tooltip: Adding category will help your card more discoverable on the market. Once you've applied a category, you can't change it later.

form_thumbnail.title: Thumbnail for create card
form_thumbnail.description: You must upload thumbnail image for your NFT card if your card have kinds of type: Audio, 3D Model, or Playable Iframe

upload_cover_info:
Size 1152px × 288px.
 Supported files: PNG, JPG. Max file size: 30mb
upload_cards_info:
Supported files: PNG, JPG, GIF, MPX, MP4, GLB.
 Max. 10 files per upload, 30mb each.
informative_create_card: To save your time, we use your file name as default title. You still can edit the title later.

step_1.where_do_you_want: Where do you want to add new cards?
step_1.you_will_create_new_collection: You will create a new collection before adding new cards to it.
step_1.you_will_select_one_of_collection: You will select one of your existing collection before adding new cards to it.

step_2.your_card_will_be_added: Your card will be added to the collection you selected
step_2.you_dont_have_collection: You don't have a collection yet
